formula: a(n)=sum(m=1..2*n, (sum(i=0..m, (-1)^(i+m/2)*(m-2*i)^(2*n)*binomial(m, i)))/(2^m*m!))*(2*n+1), n>0, a(0)=1. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011]
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=if n=0 then 1 else (sum((sum((-1)^(i+m/2)*(m-2*i)^(2*n)*binomial(m,i),i,0,m))/(2^m*m!),m,1,2*n))*(2*n+1); [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 28 2011]
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Extended with signs Mar 15 1997 by _Olivier GÃ©rard_.
